overview: Superside is looking for an ambitious, creative, well-organized, and self-motivated Event Marketing Coordinator to help our marketing team grow and scale our already successful event programs.
description: Superside is looking for an Event Marketing Coordinator to assist with planning and executing virtual, hybrid, and in-person events. The role involves coordinating multiple webinars and summits, managing logistics, developing event software and assets, and building relationships with vendors and partners. Strong project management, communication, and organizational skills are required. The ideal candidate should have 2+ years of marketing or project management experience, familiarity with the tech/SaaS/B2B industry, and proficiency in tools like Asana, Google Workspace, and Hubspot.
requirements: 2+ years of general marketing and/or project management experience
